Name: Entrance
Description: The entrance to this castle is battered with armor and broken sword littering the ground. A grand battle had transpired here indeed…

Name: Abandoned Lobby
Description: Where the knights congregated…used to that is. This is the only room that seemed to be the most intact as if someone had been fixing it up for some time.

Name: Hallway1
Description: This hallway is littered with the glass of the windows and shattered vases that held beautiful flowers. There are many rooms down the hall. You wonder: What lies beyond these many doors?”

Name: Hallway2
Description: This hallway bears no windows and only the faded potraits of what you assume to be the king and queen that ruled over this pile of rubble.  At the end of the hall towers two great doors. You may be approaching something great…

Name: King's Quarter
Description: The great doors leads you to the official residence of the crown. Illuminated by six great windows with three on each side. The golden throne glimmered in the sunlight dazzling its authority unto all of those who gaze upon it. It’s rather surprising that the throne has been left untouched. You wonder why…
